vulnerability.name: USN-4041-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4041-1 provided updates for the Linux kernel in Ubuntu. This update provides the corresponding updates for the Linux kernel for Ubuntu 16.04 ESM.  USN-4017-2 fixed vulnerabilities in the Linux kernel.  Unfortunately, the update introduced a regression that interfered with networking applications that setup very low SO_SNDBUF values. This update fixes the problem.  We apologize for the inconvenience.  Jonathan Looney discovered that the Linux kernel could be coerced into segmenting responses into multiple TCP segments. A remote attacker could construct an ongoing sequence of requests to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2019-11479)

statements.status_notes: Several security issues were fixed in the Linux kernel.
